Pope Francis, recovering from bronchitis, calls for end of Gaza conflictPope Francis on Sunday appealed for an end to the conflict in Gaza, as he showed signs of recovery after suffering from bronchitis. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 12:45:36 GMT SVIMDIRQMVMQTPIRPS3JJPUQZI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-francis-recovering-bronchitis-calls-end-gaza-conflict-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Thailand facilitates transfer of 900 scam victims from Myanmar to ChinaThailand has in the last week helped facilitate the transfer of some 900 Chinese nationals who had been trapped in scam centres in a Myanmar border town back to China, Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin said on Sunday. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 12:23:52 GMT HN5PEHIIGNK2JKGWBKPFUQEGSI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-facilitates-transfer-900-scam-victims-myanmar-china-2024-03-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Malaysia says MH370 search must go on, 10 years after plane vanishedMalaysia is pushing for a renewed search for Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, the transport minister said on Sunday, as the 10th anniversary of its disappearance in one of the world's greatest aviation mysteries approaches. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 12:19:47 GMT OGB4SGFLFZJD7BZWXA3PNQQLYI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-says-mh370-search-must-go-10-years-after-plane-vanished-2024-03-03/Danial Azhar, Mandy Leong世界亚太地区
Yemen's Houthis say they will continue sinking British shipsYemen's Iran-backed Houthis vowed on Sunday to continue targeting British ships in the Gulf of Aden following the sinking of UK-owned vessel Rubymar. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 11:17:34 GMT K2Y5Z4KS3NIERIQKP5ECUERPFU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-say-they-will-continue-sinking-british-ships-2024-03-03/Reuters世界中东
Haley has opportunity for win over Trump in small-stakes D.C. primaryPresidential contenders Donald Trump and Nikki Haley will face off in the Washington, D.C., Republican primary on Sunday, a small-stakes contest that could be one of Haley's best shots to score a win over the former president. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 11:03:19 GMT KW6BSOF5RBMS7IWDR67GGT7QQM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-haley-face-off-washington-dc-republican-primary-2024-03-03/Gram Slattery世界美国
Turkey hopes Ukraine ceasefire talks can start soonTurkey hopes talks for a ceasefire in Ukraine will start soon, Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan said on Sunday, at the end of a diplomatic forum in the southern city of Antalya. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 11:00:48 GMT RVR4LRNBCRL7ZPY7G42IENHBP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/turkey-hopes-ukraine-ceasefire-talks-can-start-soon-2024-03-03/Tuvan Gumrukcu世界
Born and died during Gaza war, infant twins are buried in RafahBorn a few weeks into the Gaza war, infant twins Wesam and Naeem Abu Anza were buried on Sunday, the youngest of 14 members of the same family whom Gaza health authorities say were killed in an Israeli airstrike in Rafah overnight. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 10:58:36 GMT EUJ763ATVVMW7NHYHWCO7BBUX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/born-died-during-gaza-war-infant-twins-are-buried-rafah-2024-03-03/Bassam Masoud, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Israeli military review of Gaza aid convoy deaths finds most killed in stampedeIsrael's military has completed a preliminary review of civilian deaths at a Gaza aid convoy last week, which determined that forces did not strike the convoy and that most Palestinians died in a stampede, a military spokesperson said on Sunday. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 10:08:55 GMT S6DN7AJILVKJLG3ZAYN4QJPXXM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-review-gaza-aid-convoy-deaths-finds-most-killed-stampede-2024-03-03/Reuters世界中东
Canada announces fresh sanctions against Russia over Navalny's deathCanada announced a fresh round of sanctions against Russia on Sunday over the death of opposition leader Alexei Navalny. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 10:02:33 GMT 3CN5BB3RIZPFZKP25FF42BHWSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-announces-fresh-sanctions-against-Russia-over-navalnys-death-2024-03-03/Reuters世界
South Korean doctors holds a mass rally against medical policyThousands of South Korean doctors held a mass rally on Sunday against government plans to increase medical school admissions, defying official calls for trainee physicians who had also walked off the job in protest to return to work. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 09:58:54 GMT世界卫生组织 DNNMISVOHLIMH5D5WVHSPFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korean-doctors-holds-mass-rally-against-medical-policy-2024-03-03/Hyun Yi, Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
Bodies of mother and baby found as death toll from Odesa drone attack risesThe death toll from a Russian drone attack on an apartment block in the southern port city of Odesa has risen to 10 after rescuers found the bodies of another mother and baby, Odesa governor Oleh Kiper said on Sunday. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 08:59:37 GMT 6A3SAIRNCZKXNFXAUTUBWJNPQI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bodies-mother-baby-found-death-toll-odesa-drone-attack-rises-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
